mapper.select: SELECT STU_NO, STU_NAME, STU_DEPT, STU_GRADE, STU_HEIGHT, STU_WEIGHT FROM STUDENT
SELECT AVG(ENR_GRADE) AS STUAVG, S.STU_NO, STU_NAME, FROM STUDENT S INNER JOIN ENROL E ON S.STU_NO = E.STU_NO WHERE S.STU_NO = #{stuNo} GROUP BY S.STU_NO, STU_NAME
SELECT SUB_NO, SUB_NAME, SUB_PROF, SUB_GRADE, SUB_DEPT FROM SUBJECT
